videos.title: Mt Elden Summit | Lookout Road Full Climb + Descent | Gravel Biking Flagstaff Arizona
videos.description: Riding Mt Elden Lookout Road all the way to the summit, then descending 3,000 feet back to the city!

videos.title: 5 minutes of a gravel ride to Flagstaff Mountain, Boulder, CO 8-19-22
videos.description: A great view of a group bike ride along the Boulder Creek Bike Path, off road, dirt and gravel.

videos.title: Sunset Gravel + Pavement After Dark | FUTS + Mars Hill Road Night Ride | Cycling Flagstaff Arizona
videos.description: Started a gravel ride at sunset, then rode home through the city after dark.
